oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy print of Union veteran John Henry Bradberry, Co. K, 6th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Cpl. Bradberry (1833-1918) served in Co. K, 6th Tenn. Cav. Regt., USA. He mustered in at Dresden in Weakley County, was listed as Absent Without Leave in early 1863, and then present at LaGrange (Tenn.) in July 1863. He is also listed as John H. Bradbery.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bradberry, John Henry
